suite.name: PlatAppServices

test.name: Get the available MEC services for a given application instance

kw.name: Get Selection From User
kw.msg: No keyword with name 'Get Selection From User' found.

test.doc:
Check that the IUT responds with a list of available MEC services for a given application instance when queried by a MEC Application
Reference ETSI GS MEC 011 V2.0.8, clause 7.15.3.1 OpenAPI https://forge.etsi.org/gitlab/mec/gs011-app-enablement-api/blob/master/Mp1.yaml#/definitions/ServiceInfo

suite.doc: A test suite for validating Application Service Availability Query (APPSAQ) operations.
